subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Mathew Sims kicked a 33-yard field goal on the final play to cap a comeback that gave Northern Illinois a 23-20 victory over Ohio in the Mid-American Conference title game in Detroit.
snippet: Mathew Sims kicked a 33-yard field goal on the final play to cap a comeback that gave Northern Illinois a 23-20 victory over Ohio in the Mid-American Conference title game in Detroit.
